title: Blade Staff
summaries: The Blade Staff is a Hardmode summon weapon that summons an Enchanted Dagger minion suspended above the player's head, attacking enemies within range by flying toward and through them repeatedly at a fast pace. It has 25 armor penetration, making it more effective against Hardmode enemies than its damage stat would indicate. The Blade Staff is dropped by Queen Slime with a drop rate of 1/4 (25%) / 1/3 (33.33%).
Additionally, Enchanted Daggers only gains 75% damage bonus from summon tag damage bonuses from <linked>whips</linked>.

Its best modifiers are Demonic, Deadly, Mystic, or Hurtful. Unlike most minions, the Enchanted Dagger deals no knockback, so the weapon cannot obtain the Ruthless modifier. Due to its low base damage, all modifiers which improve damage by 10% or more improve its damage by the same amount.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons an Enchanted Dagger to fight for you

'Don't let their small size fool you'
